TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract Factory

summary.span: 提供可用于在文档级自定义项中执行杂项任务（如在运行时创建功能区控件以及向文档添加智能标记）的方法。

span.span: Provides methods you can use to add perform miscellaneous tasks in a document-level customization, such as creating Ribbon controls at run time and adding smart tags to documents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要获取对象，请使用`Globals.Factory`项目中的属性。To get a object, use the `Globals.Factory` property in your project. 有关详细信息，请参阅[对 Office 项目中对象的全局访问](/visualstudio/vsto/global-access-to-objects-in-office-projects.md)。For more information, see [Global Access to Objects in Office Projects](/visualstudio/vsto/global-access-to-objects-in-office-projects.md). [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)]

public Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.SmartTag CreateSmartTag (string smartTagType, string caption, Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ISmartTagExtension extension = null);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.SmartTag CreateSmartTag(string smartTagType, string caption, class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ISmartTagExtension extension) cil managed

param.name: smartTagType
param.span: 智能标记的唯一标识符，由命名空间 URI 和标记类型名组成，两部分之间用数字符号 (#) 分隔。

span.span: A unique identifier for the smart tag, composed of a namespace URI and a tag type name separated by a number sign (#).

param.name: caption
param.span: 智能标记菜单上显示的智能标记的名称。

span.span: The name of the smart tag, which is displayed on the smart tag menu.

param.name: extension
param.span: 一个扩展对象，用于为智能标记定义自定义识别器。

span.span: An extension object that defines a custom recognizer for the smart tag.

Docs.summary:
创建一个 对象，该对象表示文档中的一个智能标记。
Creates a object that represents a smart tag on a document. [!INCLUDE[vsto_smart_tags](~/includes/vsto-smart-tags-md.md)]。.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 针对的有效字符串的示例`smartTagType`参数是 http://smarttags.contoso.com#TagName。An example of a valid string for the `smartTagType` parameter is http://smarttags.contoso.com#TagName. 字符串格式正确的智能标记类型不包含空格，并且下划线 (_) 或冒号 （:） 以字母 (a-z、 A-Z)，它启动。A well-formed smart tag type string does not contain white space, and it starts with a letter (a-z, A-Z), an underscore (_) or a colon (:).

exception.span: 或 为 或为空，或者 无效。

span.span: or is either or empty, or is not valid.

public Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory GetRibbonFactory ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory GetRibbonFactory() cil managed

summary.span: 返回一个可用于在运行时创建功能区控件的对象。

span.span: Returns an object that you can use to create Ribbon controls at run time.

returns.span: 一个可用于在运行时创建功能区控件的对象。

span.span: An object that you can use to create Ribbon controls at run time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当在运行时创建的功能区控件时，可以将其添加到通过创建自定义功能区**功能区 （可视化设计器）** Office 项目中的项目项。When you create a Ribbon control at run time, you can add it to a custom Ribbon that you created by using the **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** project item in an Office project. 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document GetVstoObject (Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Document document);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document GetVstoObject(class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Document document) cil managed

param.name: document
param.span: 要为其检索扩展对象的本机文档对象。

span.span: The native document object for which to retrieve the extended object.

param.span: 虽然此参数的类型是 ，但通常会将 对象传递到此方法。

span.span: Although this parameter is of type , you typically pass a object to this method.

summary.span: 返回 主机项，它将展开指定本机文档对象的功能。

span.span: Returns a host item that extends the functionality of the specified native document object.

returns.span: 如果本机文档是当前文档级自定义项中的 对象的基础对象，则为扩展本机文档对象功能的宿主项；否则为 。

span.span: The host item that extends the functionality of the native document object, if the native document is the underlying object of a object in the current document-level customization; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文档级自定义项，你无法使用此方法生成一个新扩展为本机文档对象的对象。In a document-level customization, you cannot use this method to generate a new extended object for a native document object. 你可以使用此方法只用于获取当前自定义项中的对象。You can use this method only to get a object that is in the current customization. 有关详细信息，请参阅[文档级自定义项编程](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations.md)。For more information, see [Programming Document-Level Customizations](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public bool HasVstoObject (Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Document document);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool HasVstoObject(class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Document document) cil managed

param.name: document
param.span: 要测试的本机文档对象。

span.span: The native document object to test.

param.span: 虽然此参数的类型是 ，但通常会将 对象传递到此方法。

span.span: Although this parameter is of type , you typically pass a object to this method.

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示指定的 Word 文档对象是否存在 宿主项。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether a host item exists for the specified Word document object.

returns.span: 如果指定的 对象存在 宿主项，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a host item exists for the specified object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文档级自定义项，此方法返回`true`仅当本机文档对象的基础对象当前自定义项中的对象。In a document-level customization, this method returns `true` only if the native document object is the underlying object of a object in the current customization. 否则，此方法返回 `false`。Otherwise, this method returns `false`. 有关详细信息，请参阅[文档级自定义项编程](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations.md)。For more information, see [Programming Document-Level Customizations](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations.md).
